item.title: 凡妮莎-哈金斯（Vanessa Hudgens）和科尔-塔克（Cole Tucker）即将为人父母。在走红毯时，这位女演员一边抱着肚子一边说："我显然有很多事情值得兴奋"。
item.description:
Vanessa Hudgens and Cole Tucker are going to be parents.

While walking the red carpet, the actress said, "I clearly have a lot to be excited for," while holding her stomach. https://t.co/jaJVhpI8ky

— ABC News (@ABC) March 10, 2024

item.title: 瑞恩-高斯林（Ryan Gosling）在第 96 届奥斯卡金像奖颁奖典礼上表演《我只是肯》（I'm Just Ken）之前，与妹妹曼迪-高斯林（Mandi Gosling）一起走了出来。这位明星因在影片中扮演 Ken 而获得最佳男配角提名。
item.description:
Ryan Gosling stepped out with his sister Mandi Gosling before his performance of "I'm Just Ken" at the 96th Academy Awards.

The star is nominated for best supporting actor for his role as Ken in the film. https://t.co/93RoL0dRIo

— ABC News (@ABC) March 10, 2024

item.title: 9 岁时，谢扬-韦伯-克里斯伯格（Sheyann Webb-Christburg）为争取黑人投票权从塞尔玛游行到蒙哥马利，成为塞尔玛 "最小的自由战士"。
item.description:
At 9 years old, Sheyann Webb-Christburg became Selma's "smallest freedom fighter" when she marched from Selma to Montgomery for Black voting rights. https://t.co/A4Nl72hJMr

— ABC News (@ABC) March 10, 2024

item.title: 众议员南希-梅斯（Nancy Mace）在民事陪审团裁定前总统唐纳德-特朗普在 20 世纪 90 年代对作家 E. Jean Carroll 实施性虐待后，为她对特朗普的支持进行了辩护：
item.description:
Rep. Nancy Mace defended her support for Donald Trump after a civil jury's verdict that the former president sexually abused writer E. Jean Carroll in the 1990s.

— ABC News (@ABC) March 10, 2024

item.title: 参议员凯蒂-布里特（Katie Britt）正在为她如何描述一名人口贩运受害妇女的经历进行辩护--布里特在批评拜登总统的边境政策时提到了这一描述，作为共和党对拜登总统国情咨文演讲的回应。
item.description:
Sen. Katie Britt is defending how she described the experience of a woman who was the victim of human trafficking — an account Britt pointed to when criticizing Pres. Biden's border policies as part of the GOP response to his State of the Union speech. https://t.co/ZSRNhoX0ug pic.twitter.com/oKZQ6HMq6m

— ABC News (@ABC) March 10, 2024

item.title: 交通部长皮特-布蒂吉格（Pete Buttigieg）斥责阿拉巴马州参议员凯蒂-布里特（Katie Britt）在对拜登总统国情咨文演讲的回应中误导性地使用有关性交易的轶事来攻击拜登总统在边境安全方面的记录。
item.description:

item.description:
A man arrested on suspicion of pushing his girlfriend onto the New York City subway tracks — causing both her feet to be severed by a train — had been imprisoned for attacking a woman and threatening to hurl her child off a fire escape in 2017, police say. https://t.co/nJRrKIOezT

item.title: 新的研究显示，由于地陷（土地逐渐塌陷或下沉），到 2050 年，美国 32 个沿海城市的大量土地可能面临被洪水淹没的风险。
item.description:
A considerable amount of land in 32 U.S. coastal cities could be at risk of flooding by 2050 due to subsidence, the gradual caving in or sinking of an area of land, according to new research. https://t.co/ijAh8xDdUu

— ABC News (@ABC) March 10, 2024

item.description:
